Amazon will ask for a denial certificate, issue by Apple to replace, which you will never get from Apple. This is sham, run by both of them together, where they now you run pillar to post, with no solution. A 4 day old phone with dead pixels (green dot in the picture)and both amazon and Apple won‚Äôt agree to replace. Amazon‚Äôs return policy, saying replacement within 7 days at Apple service center is a White lie. Extremely traumatic experience. Never buy an Apple device from amazon again.
